text: Jacki Schechner is a former Current TV news correspondent and on-air personality for The Stephanie Miller Show. As of 2018, she was the Editor-in- Chief of The Committee to Investigate Russia, a nonprofit organization whose website aggregates information related to alleged links between Trump associates and Russian officials. She became a target of Bill O'Reilly during his "Talking Points" segment when he kept referring to her as "the former CNN reporter."The Other Cable News Face-Off: O’Reilly vs. Schechner ==Education== Schechner has a Master of Arts in Broadcast Journalism from the University of Miami and Bachelor of Arts in Diplomatic History from the University of Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American television journalists Category:University of Miami alumni Category:University of Pennsylvania alumni
title: Jacki Schechner
